description: Wildland Firefighting Vehicle with Compressed Air Foam System
full_summary:
### Title: Request for Proposal for Wildland Firefighting Vehicles with Compressed Air Foam Systems

#### Contract Information
* Solicitation Number: W8476-236676/B
* Publication Date: 2023-08-30
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-31T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 6
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Description of Requirements
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the procurement of five (5) Wildland Firefighting Vehicles with Compressed Air Foam Systems (CAFS) with ILS deliverables. Three vehicles are to be delivered to CFB Petawawa, Ontario, one vehicle to CFB Dundurn, Saskatchewan, and one vehicle to CFB Greenwood, Nova Scotia. The requested delivery period is 450 days from contract award.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this request for proposal are based on the lowest price offered.

#### Contracting Entity Information
* Contracting Entity Name: DND/ADM(MAT)/DGLEPM/DPL 5-3-4-1
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
* Contact Information: Brian James, brian.james3@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939-3299

#### Tenders and Attachments
* Available in English and French on the Canadabuys website.
* Tender Attachments (dojis51 covers page, PDF mens)

**Debriefing Session**
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should submit their request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.
